text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActCode where concept is-a COND
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-WeightAlert
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-HeightSurfaceAreaAlert

name: ConditionDetectedIssueCode
title: ConditionDetectedIssueCode
description: Proposed therapy may be inappropriate or contraindicated due to an existing/recent patient condition or diagnosis
